DRAUGR
The problems we face have never been because of corrupt politicians. Corrupt politicians will always exist. What the real problem is, is that too many American citizens are too damned stupid not to vote for a corrupt SOB. Oh but how they cry “He/She lied to us. Well that BS doesn’t cut it either because there were a whole lot of people that pointed out the corruption of the Clinton’s, Obama’s, etc as well as mountains of evidence proving corruption, and worse. Yet the walking morons went to the polls and voted for these sleazy liars and they’ll do it again and again and again until stopped.
The United States has reached a point in which it can no longer afford to have fools voting in political elections. So far they have set the US, across all categories, back at the very least 50 years with their idiot policies and gullibility when voting.
The US must implement two policies if it is to survive another 50 years.
The first thing that must be instituted is mandatory testing of all voters. Voters must have some knowledge of current events, the purpose and how government functions at both state and local levels, US and world history, basic knowledge of US law, immigration, etc, etc. before being allowed to vote. Also all voters must have an IQ of at least 90, not have been on government welfare longer than 18 months or have been convicted of a felony.
We cannot have these low IQ, anti America, anti society people making huge decisions by voting when they have not a clue as to why, who, what, where or reason for voting. Their stupid voting practices are taking money out of your pockets right now as well robbing your children’s future. It must stop.
The second thing is to stop all “convenience” abortions and instead begin paying people to undergo voluntary sterility surgery. This would almost eliminate abortion as well as break the cycle of generational welfare and at the same time greatly decrease the number of people who would not qualify to vote.
I am dead serious on both issues. I am sick of watching my once proud country fall apart because absolute morons are voting into power absolute corrupt criminals.
Our country has not evolved nor grown great and strong. It has become weak, feeble, insane and inept. 100 years ago anyone like Bill  Hillary Clinton, the Obama’s, the Bush’s, etc would not only have been rejected to hold any government position, they would have been hung for their treasonous acts.

Still waiting. Should have been done months ago.
Americans are deceived, for sure.  But people in all other countries are as well. The people decide to go to war and those who endorse and encourage their “leaders” to go to war; bomb that nation to rubble are all in a deep satanic coma, so to speak.
They average person does not stop to think and some of them don’t care of the results. They are brainwashed into thinking that this has always been the way we do things; it is just.  I’ve been sending proof via pics.. articles etc, to many, many people showing them the results of what they endorse.   I never hear back and or if you speak to someone about it, they just don’t want to hear about it.
If all of us do just what The Holy Creator has Laid out for us to do, very simple things BTW, the filthy, violent and beyond evil that is done to one and other would vanish.  But, since there are so many liars in the political world, the “religious” world, in the media, that won’t happen.
I just have to scratch my head. How so very temporarily will these “world leaders” have…..? just what?
What then “world leaders”?
But first, some extreme warnings to the “leaders” of this world’s governments, corporations, media and religious institutions who are engaging in partnership with world’s governments, are actually promoting, accommodating, bolstering and encouraging the execution (the execution of the task) of violent, malevolent, malignant and perverted actions which provoke and keep the world in utter chaos and violence.
YOU and all those who have sought and gained power positions and or positions of trust everywhere in this world including most all of the media: ROOT OUT PEDOPHILES AND ALL CRIMINALS IN YOUR GOVERNMENTS AND ORGANIZATIONS NOW. YOU AND YOURS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE FILTH AND MISERY OF THE WORLD OVER IF YOU ALLOW, AND OR LOOK THE OTHER WAY FROM ACTS OF ABUSE. FURTHER IF YOU ABUSE AND TERRORIZE CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES OR ANYONE FOR THAT MATTER ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD, YOU WILL BE HELD SO VERY ACCOUNTABLE.
This is a reality check.    Your impending doom will come to pass and you won’t know even when it’s upon you.
And it will not be elegant, luxurious, painless nor exclusive. Please turn back to God.
To anyone anywhere in the world at anytime who believe they have done things in secrecy and have gotten away with any rot, think again.  Everything you plan, say and enact has been/is being watched.  By the Holy Creator, Christ Who Sees and Hears everything and all of the time!
You have never done anything in secrecy.  It will all have been futile and fruitless. You will gain nothing.  All of your sordid and unstable plans will go right down the rusted old drain.
THERE ARE MANY SINCERELY TRYING TO DO THE RIGHT THING; THERE ARE MANY EQUALLY STRIVING TO DO THE WRONG THING.
IF YOU KEEP DOING WHAT YOUR DOING, THEN JUST WHO DO YOU THINK YOU’RE KIDDING?? THE WORLD? MAYBE, FOR JUST A LITTLE WHILE. PLEASE WAKE UP!
ARROGANCE BREEDS SUCH UNINTELLIGENT THINKING. APPARENTLY YOU DON’T EVEN REALIZE THIS.
WOW!
**POWER GRABBERS**:
WHAT WILL YOU DO WHEN GOD TAKES AWAY ALL OF YOUR BILLION$ AND TRILLION$?
AND HE WILL. SOME OF YOU NOW, SOME OF YOU LATER.
Here is the answer: [all] of you will then know that it is YOU and those like you that have been flim flammed by your own father; the diminutive “god” of ALL murderers, killers, liars, filth and horrors of this world. It is this unseen evil that rules in this world. It also deceives, fools, deludes and swindles. You and all those like you, listen to this evil one and gladly do it’s deeds. Some of you don’t realize that you are being led by this rotted force. But, you’re been deluded into thinking that it is you who are so intelligent. That it is you who are smarter than all the rest because you became so fabulously wealthy; at the expense of all others. You will bring it upon yourselves because you listened to the bad instead of the Good.
This unseen evil is glad to be setting up all of the greedy, perverted and murderous ones that think they are operating under secrecy. You’ve betrayed everyone else, but you will also be betrayed and you won’t know when it hits. But, if you wait too long, then it will be too late for you. So, now is the time, seriously, to stop the lunatic filth, misery, famine and tortures that you do and turn back to God. Don’t you realize that what you are now doing to others, will come back to haunt you?! This will not be pleasant.
Please wake up and turn back to God. Humble yourself and be kind and caring.  You’d be surprised at how much better and easier that is than it is always trying to get ahead by this world’s standards, by crushing anyone who seems to get in your way.
Is it worth it to murder and steal the entire world and then gain it for just a few seconds?  Revelation 6:15-17
Realize we are only on this earth for such a short time, in the scheme of things?  Do these “world” “leaders” and “religious” “leaders” know they are going to die and then have to stand before the Creator of all things; Christ, Who is Wholly Pure, Good and Humble and have to explain why they did what they did when they could have done things much differently?
REPENT AND TURN THINGS AROUND BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE !
The time is now!!!
